member.name: T:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1
member.summary: SafeList is mutable, but it uses immutable data structures to minimize the need for locking. The provided manipulation Exposes a immutable list. Changes are made by copying the lists. SafeList is Never perform logic on SafeList directly, always use GetList() or GetCollection() first, followed by SetList(). If you need involved list-fu, use ModifyList and specify a callback. It will execute inside a lock, preventing changes on other threads from overwriting each other.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1.GetCollection
member.summary: Returns an immutable snapshot of the collection

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1.GetList
member.summary: Returns a mutable snapshot of the list

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1.SetList(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0})
member.summary: Replaces the current collection with a new one. (copied to ensure safety) Use ModifyList when modifying the list. Use this only when the previous or current state of the list is irrelevant.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds the specified item to the end of the list

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1.Remove(`0)
member.summary: Removes the item from the list

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1.AddFirst(`0)
member.summary: Adds the specified item to the beginning of the list

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1.ModifyList(ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList{`0}.ListEditor)
member.summary: Allows a caller to perform logic on the list inside a lock, and return a modified list. Callbacks should be fast, and should reference the IList they are fed, not this SafeList instance. Calling methods on the SafeList instance will cause a deadlock.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1.Contains(`0)
member.summary: Returns true if the collection contains the specified item at the moment.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1.First
member.summary: Returns the first item in the list. May return null if the list is empty.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.SafeList`1.Last
member.summary: Returns the first item in the list. May return null if the list is empty.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.Trial
member.summary: Can be used by plugins to implement 'trial version' functionality

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Resizing.BuilderExtension
member.summary: Provides a useable base class that can be used to modify the behavior of ImageBuilder. When registered with an ImageBuilder instance, the ImageBuilder will call the corresponding methods on the extension prior to executing its own methods.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor
member.summary: Not for external use. Inherit from ImageBuilderExtension Dual-purpose base class for both ImageBuilder and ImageBuilderExtension Extensions can inherit and override certain methods. ImageBuilder inherits this method to utilize its extension invocation code. Each method of AbstractImageProcessor loops through all extensions and executes the same method on each. Provides a sort of multiple-inheritance mechanisim.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new AbstractImageProcessor with no extensions

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ImageResizer.Resizing.BuilderExtension})
member.summary: Creates a new AbstractImageProcessor which will run the specified extensions with each method call.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.exts
member.summary: Contains the set of extensions that are called for every method.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PreLoadImage(System.Object@,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: Extend this to allow additional types of source objects to be accepted by transforming them into accepted types, such as Image, Bitmap, Stream, or a physical path

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.LoadImageFailed(System.Exception,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Extensions are executed until one extension returns a non-null value. This is taken to mean that the error has been resolved.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.LoadImageFailed(System.Exception,System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Extensions are executed until one extension returns a non-null value. This is taken to mean that the error has been resolved.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PreAcquireStream(System.Object@,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: Extend this to allow additional types of *destination* objects to be accepted by transforming them into either a bitmap or a stream.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.OnBuildToStream(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.IO.Stream,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: Called for Build() calls that want the result encoded. (Not for Bitmap Build(source,settings) calls. Only override this method if you need to replace the behavior of image encoding and image processing together, such as adding support for resizing multi-page TIFF files or animated GIFs.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.buildToBitmap(System.Drawing.Bitmap,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings,System.Boolean)
M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.OnProcess(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.0 First step of the Process() method. Can replace the entire Process method if RequestAction.Cancel is returned. Can be used to add points to translate (for image maps), and also to modify the settings

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PrepareSourceBitmap(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.1 Switches the bitmap to the correct frame or page, and applies source flipping commands.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostPrepareSourceBitmap(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.2 Extend this to apply any pre-processing to the source bitmap that needs to occur before Layout begins

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.Layout(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).0: This is the last point at which points to translate should be added. Only return RequestedAction.Cancel if you wish to replace the entire Layout sequence logic.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.FlipExistingPoints(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).1: This is where the points in the layout are flipped the same way the source bitmap was flipped (unless their flags specify otherwise)

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.LayoutImage(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).2: Rings 'image' and 'imageArea' are added to the layout.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostLayoutImage(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).3: Add rings here to insert them between the image area and the padding

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.LayoutPadding(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).4: Ring "padding" is added to the layout

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostLayoutPadding(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).5: Add rings here to insert them between the padding and the border

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.LayoutBorder(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).6: Ring "border" is added to the layout

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostLayoutBorder(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).7: Add rings here to insert them between the border and the effect rings

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.LayoutEffects(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).8: Effects such as 'shadow' are added here.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostLayoutEffects(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).9: Add rings here to insert them between the effects and the margin

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.LayoutMargin(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).10: Margins are added to the layout

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostLayoutMargin(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).11: Add rings here to insert them around the margin. Rings will be outermost

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.LayoutRotate(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).anytime: Occurs when the layout is rotated. May be called anytime during Layout()

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostLayoutRotate(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).anytime: Occurs after the layout is rotated. May be called anytime during Layout()

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.LayoutNormalize(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).anytime: Occurs when the layout is normalized to 0,0. May be called anytime during Layout()

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostLayoutNormalize(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).anytime: Occurs after the layout is normalized. May be called anytime during Layout()

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.LayoutRound(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).anytime: Occurs when the layout point values are rounded to integers. May be called anytime during Layout()

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostLayoutRound(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).anytime: Occurs after the layout point values are rounded to integers. May be called anytime during Layout()

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.EndLayout(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3(Layout).12: Occurs once layout has finished. No more changes should occur to points or rings in the layout after this method. destSize is calculated here.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PrepareDestinationBitmap(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.4: The destination bitmap is created and sized based destSize. A graphics object is initialized for rendering.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.Render(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render) Rendering. Do not return RequestedAction.Cancel unless you want to replace the entire rendering system.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.RenderBackground(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).1 The background color is rendered

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostRenderBackground(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).2 After the background color is rendered

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.RenderEffects(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).3 Effects (such as a drop shadow or outer glow) are rendered

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostRenderEffects(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).4 After outer effects are rendered

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.RenderPadding(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).5 Image padding is drawn

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostRenderPadding(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).6 After image padding is drawn

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.CreateImageAttribues(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).7: An ImageAttributes instance is created if it doesn't already exist.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostCreateImageAttributes(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).8: The ImageAttributes instance exists and can be modified or replaced.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.RenderImage(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).9: The image is copied to the destination parallelogram specified by ring 'image'.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostRenderImage(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).10: After the image is drawn

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.RenderBorder(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).11: The border is rendered

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostRenderBorder(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).12: After the border is drawn

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PreRenderOverlays(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).13: Any last-minute changes before watermarking or overlays are applied

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.RenderOverlays(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).14: Watermarks can be rendered here. All image processing should be done

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PreFlushChanges(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).15: Called before changes are flushed and the graphics object is destroyed.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.FlushChanges(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).16: Changes are flushed to the bitmap here and the graphics object is destroyed.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.PostFlushChanges(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.5(Render).17: Changes have been flushed to the bitmap, but the final bitmap has not been flipped yet.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.ProcessFinalBitmap(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.6: Non-rendering changes to the bitmap object occur here, such as flipping. The graphics object is unavailable.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.AbstractImageProcessor.EndProcess(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.7: Layout and rendering are both complete.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.IPlugin.Install(ImageResizer.Configuration.Config)
member.summary: Installs the plugin in the specified Config instance. The plugin must handle all the work of loading settings, registering the plugin etc.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.IPlugin.Uninstall(ImageResizer.Configuration.Config)
member.summary: Uninstalls the plugin. Should reverse all changes made during Install

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.Trial.Uninstall(ImageResizer.Configuration.Config)
member.summary: The Trial plugin cannot be removed using this method.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.NoCache
member.summary: Default cache when DiskCache isn't installed. Useful for debugging purposes but unsuited for production use, and will use large quanities of RAM. (Scales to fewer than 5 concurrent requests). Serves content directly to the client.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Caching.ICache
member.summary: Manages updating the cache and serving data from it.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Caching.ICache.CanProcess(System.Web.HttpContext,ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs)
member.summary: Returns false if the cache is unable to process the request. If false, the caller should fall back to a different cache

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Caching.ICache.Process(System.Web.HttpContext,ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs)
member.summary: Must update the cache if needed, then either rewrite, redirect or serve the cached data.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.NoCache.Install(ImageResizer.Configuration.Config)
member.summary: Installs the caching system as the first choice.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.NoCache.Uninstall(ImageResizer.Configuration.Config)
member.summary: Removes the plugin.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.NoCache.Process(System.Web.HttpContext,ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs)
member.summary: Sends the response directly to the client with no caching logic.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Caching.ICacheProvider
member.summary: Provides cache selection logic

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Caching.ICacheProvider.GetCachingSystem(System.Web.HttpContext,ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs)
member.summary: Selects a caching system for the specified request and response

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs
member.summary: A collection of data and callbacks that can be passed to a caching object.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs.RequestKey
member.summary: A string derived from the request, which can contain any kind of data. To get a cache key that varies with the source modified date, it should be combined with the value of GetModifiedDateUTC() and hashed.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs.RewrittenQuerystring
member.summary: The rewritten querystring. Can be useful for caching systems that accept querystring arguments.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs.SuggestedExtension
member.summary: A file extension appropriate for the resulting data. May be different than the extension on the original request.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs.ResponseHeaders
member.summary: The content-type of the data, among other things. Set ResponseHeaders.ApplyDuringPreSendRequestHeaders to automatically write caching headers based on ResponseHeaders values. Caching systems that use redirects may use this data as hints when configuring caching on the remote server.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs.GetModifiedDateUTC
member.summary: A delegate that returns the modified date of the source data.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs.HasModifiedDate
member.summary: True if a modified date is available for verifying cache integrity.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseArgs.ResizeImageToStream
member.summary: A callback method that will resize, encode, and write the data to the given stream.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.ResponseArgs.GetModifiedDateUTC
member.summary: A callback method to return the last modified date of the source file if available, or DateTime.MinValue if not.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.ResponseArgs.ResizeImageToStream
member.summary: A callback method that will resize and encode the image into a stream.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.ResponseArgs.RequestKey
member.summary: A value derived from the request. Can be used as a cache key.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.ResponseArgs.HasModifiedDate
member.summary: True if the source file/record has a modified date

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.Image404Redirect
member.summary: Stub class, plan to implement later

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Caching.ResizeImageDelegate
member.summary: A callback method that will resize, encode, and write the data to the given stream. Callback may throw FileNotFoundException when running on top of an optimistic VPP

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Caching.ModifiedDateDelegate
member.summary: A callback method to return the last modified date of the source file if available, or DateTime.MinValue if not available.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Encoding.IEncoder.CreateIfSuitable(System.Drawing.Image,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: If the encoder can handle the requirements specified by 'settings', it should return an encoder instance. If not, it should return null.
member.param: A source image used to provide hinting for palette generation and for determining the fallback image format. Leave it null if not available.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Encoding.IEncoder.Write(System.Drawing.Image,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Encodes the image to the specified stream

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Encoding.IEncoder.SupportsTransparency
member.summary: True if the output format will support transparency as it is currently configured.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Encoding.IEncoder.MimeType
member.summary: Returns the appropriate mime-time for the output format as currently configured.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Encoding.IEncoder.Extension
member.summary: Returns a file extension appropriate for the output format as currently configured, without a leading dot.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.IQuerystringPlugin.GetSupportedQuerystringKeys
member.summary: If the plugin reads any values from the querystring, the names of the keys should be specified here. This information is required so that the HttpModule knows when to handle an image request.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.IsValidOutputFormat(System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Returns true if the this encoder supports the specified image format

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.Write(System.Drawing.Image,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the specified image to the stream using Quality and OutputFormat

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.GetRequestedFormat(System.String,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Tries to parse an ImageFormat from the settings.Format value. If an unrecogized format is specified, returns null. If an unsupported format is specified, it is returned. If *no* format is specified, returns defaultValue.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.GetOriginalFormat(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Attempts to determine the ImageFormat of the source image. First attempts to parse the path, if a string is present in original.Tag. Falls back to using original.RawFormat. Returns null if both 'original' is null. RawFormat has a bad reputation, so this may return unexpected values, like MemoryBitmap or something in some situations.
member.param: The source image that was loaded from a stream

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.GetImageFormatFromPhysicalPath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the ImageFormat enumeration value based on the extension in the specified physical path. Extensions can lie, just a guess.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.GetExtensionFromImageFormat(System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Returns an string instance from the specfied ImageFormat. First matching entry in imageExtensions is used. Returns null if not recognized.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder._imageExtensions
member.summary: Returns a dict of (lowercase invariant) image extensions and ImageFormat values

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.GetImageFormatFromExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an ImageFormat instance from the specfied file extension. Extensions lie sometimes, just a guess. returns null if not recognized.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.addImageExtension(System.String,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: NOT thread-safe!

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.GetContentTypeFromImageFormat(System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Supports Png, Jpeg, Gif, Bmp, and Tiff.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.GetImageCodeInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the first ImageCodeInfo instance with the specified mime type. Returns null if there are no matches.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.SaveJpeg(System.Drawing.Image,System.IO.Stream,System.Int32)
member.summary: Saves the specified image to the specified stream using jpeg compression of the specified quality.
member.param: A number between 0 and 100. Defaults to 90 if passed a negative number. Numbers over 100 are truncated to 100. 90 is a *very* good setting.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.SavePng(System.Drawing.Image,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the image in png form. If Stream 'target' is not seekable, a temporary MemoryStream will be used to buffer the image data into the stream

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.OutputFormat
member.summary: If you set this to anything other than Gif, Png, or Jpeg, it will throw an exception. Defaults to Jpeg

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.Quality
member.summary: The Jpeg compression quality. 90 is the best setting. Not relevant in Png or Gif compression

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.SupportsTransparency
member.summary: Returns true if the desired output type supports transparency.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.MimeType
member.summary: Returns the default mime-type for the OutputFormat

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DefaultEncoder.Extension
member.summary: Returns the default file extesnion for OutputFormat

member.name: T:ImageResizer.ResizerSection
member.summary: Handles reading the <resizer> section from Web.Config

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ResizerSection.getCopyOfNode(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the specified subtree, deep copied so it can be used without locking.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ResizerSection.OnDeserializeUnrecognizedElement(System.String,System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Called for each child element not specified declaratively

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Selector
member.summary: Encapsulates a node/attribute selection query, such as "node.node.attribute"

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Selector.GetSublist(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a subset of the list starting at the specified index

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Issues.IssueSink.GetIssues
member.summary: Returns a copy of the list of reported issues.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Issues.IssueSink.AcceptIssue(ImageResizer.Configuration.Issues.IIssue)
member.summary: Adds the specified issue to the list unless it is an exact duplicate of another instance.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.#ctor(ImageResizer.Configuration.Config)
member.summary: Creates a new plugin config section, attached to the specified parent

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.LoadPlugins
member.summary: Processes the <plugins> section if they are not already loaded. Thread safe. Only executes once.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.loadPluginsInternal
member.summary: Not thread safe. Performs actual work.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.GetPluginsByType(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the subset of AllPlugins which implement the specified type or interface

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.GetEncoder(System.Drawing.Image,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: Returns an instance of the first encoder that claims to be able to handle the specified settings. Returns null if no encoders are available.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.remove_plugin(System.Object)
member.summary: For use only by plugins during .Uninstall. Removes the specified plugin from AllPlugins, QuerystringPlugins, CachingSystems, ImageEncoders, and ImageBuiderExtensions, based on which interfaces the instance implements. Plugins may register event handlers and modify settings - thus you should use the plugin's method to uninstall them vs. using this method.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.add_plugin(ImageResizer.Plugins.IPlugin)
member.summary: For use only by plugins during .Install. Call Plugin.Install instead of this method. Adds the specified plugin to AllPlugins, QuerystringPlugins, CachingSystems, ImageEncoders, and ImageBuiderExtensions, based on which interfaces the instance implements. For ICache and IEncoder, the plugin is inserted at the beginning of CachingSystems and ImageEncoders respectively. Plugins may register event handlers and modify settings - thus you should use the plugin's method to uninstall them vs. using this method.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.HasPluginOfType(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns true if at least one plugin of the specified type is registered.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.PluginsLoaded
member.summary: Returns true if the <plugins> section has been processed

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.ImageBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Currently registered set of ImageBuilderExtensions.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.ImageEncoders
member.summary: Currently registered IEncoders.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.CachingSystems
member.summary: Currently registered ICache instances

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.QuerystringPlugins
member.summary: Plugins which accept querystring arguments are registered here.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.FileExtensionPlugins
member.summary: Plugins which accept new file extensions (in the url) are registered here.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PluginConfig.AllPlugins
member.summary: All plugins should be registered here. Used for diagnostic purposes.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.IPipelineConfig.IsAcceptedImageType(System.String)
member.summary: True if the specified extension is one that the pipeline can handle

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.IPipelineConfig.HasPipelineDirective(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: True if the querystring contains any directives that are understood by the pipeline

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.IPipelineConfig.GetImageBuilder
member.summary: Returns an ImageBuilder instance to use for image processing.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.IPipelineConfig.GetCacheProvider
member.summary: Returns a ICacheProvider instance that provides caching system selection and creation.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.IPipelineConfig.ModifiedQueryStringKey
member.summary: The key in Context.Items to store the modified querystring (i.e, post-rewrite). Allows VirtualPathProviders to access the rewritten data.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.IPipelineConfig.ResponseArgsKey
member.summary: The key in Context.Items to store the IResponseArgs object

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.IPipelineConfig.VppUsage
member.summary: The behavior to use when accessing the file system.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.IPipelineConfig.FakeExtensions
member.summary: A list of fake extensions to strip from incoming requests before verifying they are the correct type of request for the pipeline to process. Should include leading periods;

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig._cacheUrlData
member.summary: Populates the cache if it is empty. Not thread safe.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.IsAcceptedImageType(System.String)
member.summary: The specified path must not include a querystring. Slashes, spaces, question marks, ampersands, and colons are not permitted in the extension. If it contains a multipart extension like .txt.zip, only "zip" will be recognized.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.HasPipelineDirective(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Returns true if any of the querystring keys match any of the directives supported by the pipeline (such as width, height, format, bgcolor, etc)

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.GuessFinalExtension(System.String,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: Returns a very good guess of the final output format based on the specified settings and the original file name. Returns the file extension without the leading dot.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.AcceptedImageExtensions
member.summary: Returns a unqiue copy of the image extensions supported by the pipeline. Performs a cached query to all registered IQuerystringPlugin instances. Use IsAcceptedImageType for better performance.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.SupportedQuerystringKeys
member.summary: Returns a unqiue copy of all querystring keys supported by the pipeline. Performs a cached query to all registered IQuerystringPlugin instances. Use HasPipelineDirective for better performance.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.FakeExtensions
member.summary: Cached access to pipeline.fakeExtensions

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.OnFirstRequest
member.summary: Fired once, on the first PostAuthorizeRequest event.

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.PostAuthorizeRequestStart
member.summary: Fires during the PostAuthorizeRequest phase, prior to any module-specific logic. Executes for every request to the website. Use only as a last resort. Other events occur only for image requests, and thus have lower overhead.

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.Rewrite
member.summary:
Fired during PostAuthorizeRequest, after ResizeExtension has been removed. On fired on requests with extensions that match supported image types.
You can add additonal supported image extentions by registering a plugin that implementes IQuerystringPlugin, or you can add an extra extension in the URL and remove it here. Example: .psd.jpg

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.RewriteDefaults
member.summary:
Fired during PostAuthorizeRequest, after Rewrite. Any changes made here (which conflict) will be overwritten by the the current querystring values. I.e, this is a good place to specify default settings.
Only fired on accepted image types. (see Rewrite)

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.PostRewrite
member.summary:
Fired after all other rewrite events.
Only fired on accepted image types. (see Rewrite)

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.PostAuthorizeImage
member.summary: Fired after all rewriting should be finished, and the secondary UrlAuthorization has been completed. Plugins wanting to add additional authorization rules can implement them in a handler, and modify the response accordingly.

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.ImageMissing
member.summary: Fired when the specified image doesn't exist. Only called for images that would normally be processed. May be called during PostAuthorizeRequest or later - End the request completely with a redirect if you want alternate behavior.

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.PreHandleImage
member.summary: Fired immediately before the image request is sent off to the caching system for proccessing. Allows modification of response headers, caching arguments, and callbacks.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.PipelineConfig.ProcessedCount
member.summary: The number of images processed by this pipeline.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.ring
member.summary: An ordered, named collection of polygons. pointsToTranslate, imageOuterEdge, imageAreaOuterEdge.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.AddRing(System.String,ImageResizer.Resizing.BoxPadding)
member.summary: Inflates the last ring using the specified padding options. Returns the resulting ring object

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.GetBoundingBox
member.summary: Gets a bounding box that encloses all rings that don't have ExcludeFromBoundingBox set.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.Rotate(System.Double,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Rotates all existing rings (Except those flagged ignore)

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.Normalize(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Normalizes all rings and invisible polygons so that the outermost ring's bounding box starts at the specified orign.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.Scale(System.Double,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Scales all rings and invisible polygons by the specified factor, around the specified point.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.Shift(System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Drawing.RectangleF)
member.summary: Translates and scales all rings and invisible polygons as specified.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Access and set the Point[] arrays of rings by key. Case-insensitive.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.LastRing
member.summary: Returns the last ring that was added. Only returns PointSets where flags = Ring

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.PointFlags.Ring
member.summary: This polygon participates in the layout phase, and reserves space when added. Affected by all batch operations. Will be returned by LastRing until a new ring is added.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.PointFlags.Invisible
member.summary: Doesn't participate in layout, takes no space, but is affected by batch operations. Will never be returned by LastRing and ignored when calculating bounding boxes.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.PointFlags.Ignored
member.summary: Completely ignored by all operations, left intact.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Resizing.LayoutBuilder.PointSet.PointBehavior
member.summary: How the pointsToTranslate should be translated if they are cropped out of the destination image.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.BoxPadding.GetEdgeOffsets
member.summary: Gets edge offsets as a clockwise array, starting with Top.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders
member.summary: Allows customization of response headers for a processed image, as well as configuration of the caching system.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.ContentType
member.summary: The mime-type of the output data. Defaults to null.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.CacheControl
member.summary: The cache setting. Defaults to private

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.Expires
member.summary: The UTC time at which the cached data should expire. Browsers generally don't re-request resources until the they have expired (unlike modififeddate). If MinValue, will be ignored.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.LastModified
member.summary: The UTC modified date send with the response. Used by browsers with If-Modified-Since to check a cached value is still valid. If = MinValue, will be ignored.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.ValidUntilExpires
member.summary: When true: If a client requests a refresh, the response will *still* be served from the server cache. Defaults to false

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.SuppressVaryHeader
member.summary: ASP.Net sometimes sends Vary: * which obliterates caching. Vary is to be avoided anyhow. Defaults to true

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.DefaultHeaders
member.summary: These headers should be applied first, prior to the application of other settings

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.Headers
member.summary: These headers are applied after applying all of the other settings. (and they will overwrite exisiting values).

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.ServerCacheDependencies
member.summary: Returns a collection of dependencies used for invalidating the server cache. Note, having items here will disable kernel-mode caching. Perhaps it is better to simply use LastModified

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.ApplyToResponse
member.summary: A delegate method to apply the values stored in IResponseHeaders to the specified HttpContext.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.IResponseHeaders.ApplyDuringPreSendRequestHeaders
member.summary: True if the application should automatically execute ApplyToResponse() during the PreSendRequestHeaders event.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.ScaleMode.DownscaleOnly
member.summary: The default. Only downsamples images - never enlarges. If an image is smaller than 'width' and 'height', the image coordinates are used instead.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.ScaleMode.UpscaleOnly
member.summary: Only upscales (zooms) images - never downsamples except to meet web.config restrictions. If an image is larger than 'width' and 'height', the image coordinates are used instead.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.ScaleMode.Both
member.summary: Upscales and downscales images according to 'width' and 'height', within web.config restrictions.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.ScaleMode.UpscaleCanvas
member.summary: When the image is smaller than the requested size, padding is added instead of stretching the image

member.name: F:ImageResizer.StretchMode.Proportionally
member.summary: Maintains aspect ratio. Default.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.StretchMode.Fill
member.summary: Skews image to fit the new aspect ratio defined by 'width' and 'height'

member.name: F:ImageResizer.CropMode.None
member.summary: Default. No cropping - uses letterboxing if strecth=proportionally and both width and height are specified.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.CropMode.Auto
member.summary: Minimally crops to preserve aspect ratio if stretch=proportionally.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.CropMode.Custom
member.summary: Crops using the custom crop rectangle. Letterboxes if stretch=proportionally and both widht and height are specified.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.RequestedAction.None
member.summary: Does nothing

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.RequestedAction.Cancel
member.summary: Requests that ImageBuilder cancels the default logic of the method, and stop executing plugin calls for the method immediately.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node
member.summary: No support for namespaces, no intention of eventual serialization. Everything is case-insensitive, but preserves case. Not thread safe.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlElement,ImageResizer.Configuration.Issues.IIssueReceiver)
member.summary: Builds a tree of Nodes from the specified XML subtree. Duplicate attributes are sent to 'ir'

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.childrenByName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the subset of Children with a matching element name. (Case-insensitive)

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.queryAttr(System.String)
member.summary: Queryies the subtree for the specified attribute on the specified element. Example selector: element.element.attrname Assumes that the last segment of the selector is an attribute name. Throws an ArgumentException if there is only one segment ( element ). Uses the cache.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.setAttr(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the specified attribute value, creating parent elements if needed. Clears the query cache.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.setAttr(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the specified attribute value, creating parent elements if needed. Clears the query cache.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.makeNodeTree(System.String)
member.summary: Traverses the specified path, creating any missing elements along the way. Uses existing nodes if found.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.query(System.String)
member.summary: Same as query(), except results are cached until clearQueryCache() is called. Faster, but can be incorrect if existing nodes are renamed, moved, or deleted.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.deepCopy
member.summary: Makes a recusive copy of the subtree, keeping no duplicate references to mutable types.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.Attrs
member.summary: Attributes

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.Name
member.summary: The name of the element.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.Children
member.summary: Child nodes

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node.IsEmpty
member.summary: Returns true if the element has neither attributes nor children.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.Scale
member.summary: Whether to downscale, upscale, or allow both on images

member.name: P:ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.Stretch
member.summary: Whether to preserve aspect ratio or stretch.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.ResizeSettings.CropMode
member.summary: Crop settings. Defaults to None - letterboxing is used if both width and height are supplied, and stretch = proportionally.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder
member.summary: Provides methods for generating resizied images, and for reading and writing them to disk. Use ImageManager.Create to get the default instance, or use ImageManager.Instance.Create() to control which extensions are used.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.encoderProvider
member.summary: Handles the encoder selection and provision proccess.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.#ctor(ImageResizer.Encoding.IEncoderProvider)
member.summary: Creates a new ImageBuilder instance with no extensions.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ImageResizer.Resizing.BuilderExtension},ImageResizer.Encoding.IEncoderProvider)
member.summary: Create a new instance of ImageBuilder using the specified extensions and encoder provider. Extension methods will be fired in the order they exist in the collection.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.Create(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ImageResizer.Resizing.BuilderExtension},ImageResizer.Encoding.IEncoderProvider)
member.summary: Creates another instance of the class using the specified extensions. Subclasses should override this and point to their own constructor.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.Copy
member.summary: Copies the instance along with extensions. Subclasses must override this.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.LoadImage(System.Object,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: Loads a Bitmap from the specified source. If a filename is available, it will be attached to bitmap.Tag. The filename may be virtual, relative, UNC, windows, or unix.
member.param: May be an instance of string, VirtualFile, IVirtualBitmapFile, HttpPostedFile, Bitmap, Image, or Stream

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.Build(System.Object,System.Object,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: Resizes and processes the specified source image and stores the encoded result in the specified destination.
member.param: May be an instance of string (a physical path), VirtualFile, IVirtualBitmapFile, HttpPostedFile, Bitmap, Image, or Stream.
May be a physical path (string), or a Stream instance. Does not have to be seekable.
Resizing and processing command to apply to the.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.buildToStream(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.IO.Stream,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: Override this when you need to override the behavior of image encoding and/or Bitmap processing Not for external use.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.buildToBitmap(System.Drawing.Bitmap,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Override this when you need to override the behavior of Bitmap processing. Not for external use.
member.param: True if the output method will support transparency. If false, the image should be provided a matte color

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.Process(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Processes an ImageState instance. Used by Build, GetFinalSize, and TranslatePoint. Can be overriden by a plugin with the OnProcess methid

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.Layout(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.3: Handles the layout phase of Processing

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.Render(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Handles the rendering phase of processing

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.PrepareSourceBitmap(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Process.1 Switches the bitmap to the correct frame or page, and applies source flipping commands

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.PrepareDestinationBitmap(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Creates a bitmap of s.destSize dimensions, intializes a graphics object for it, and configures all the default settings.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.RenderBackground(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Sets the background color if needed or requested

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.TranslatePoints(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.Size,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: Doesn't support flipping. Translate a point on the original bitmap to a point on the new bitmap. If the original point no longer exists, returns Empty

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.GetFinalSize(System.Drawing.Size,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: Gets the final size of an image

member.name: M:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.LayoutImage(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState)
member.summary: Populates copyRect, as well as Rings image and imageArea. Translates and scales any existing rings as if they existed on the original bitmap.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.EncoderProvider
member.summary: Handles the encoder selection and provision proccess.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.Current
member.summary: Returns a shared instance of ImageBuilder or a subclass, equivalent to Config.Current.CurrentImageBuilder

member.name: T:ImageResizer.ImageBuilder.BitmapHolder
member.summary: Allows Bitmap Build(object) to wrap void Build(object,object) easily.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Issues.IssueGatherer.#ctor(ImageResizer.Configuration.Config)
member.summary: Creates a 'gatherer' that pulls issues from IIssueProviders throughout the Config structure. Even plugins are queried.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.InterceptModule
member.summary: Monitors incoming image requests to determine if resizing (or other processing) is requested by their querystring

member.name: M:ImageResizer.InterceptModule.System#Web#IHttpModule#Init(System.Web.HttpApplication)
member.summary: Called when the app is initialized

member.name: M:ImageResizer.InterceptModule.CheckRequest_PostAuthorizeRequest(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is where we filter requests and intercept those that want resizing performed. We first strip FakeExtension, then verify the remaining file extension is supported for decoding. We fire URL rewriting events. If the result includes any supported querystring params afterwards, we process the request. Otherwise we let it fall back to IIS/ASP.NET. If the file doesn't exist, we also ignore the request. They're going to cause a 404 anyway.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.InterceptModule.fixPath(System.String)
member.summary: Turns relative paths into domain-relative paths. Turns app-relative paths into domain relative paths.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.InterceptModule.ResizeRequest(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile)
member.summary: Generates the resized image to disk (if needed), then rewrites the request to that location. Perform 404 checking before calling this method. Assumes file exists. Called during PostAuthorizeRequest

member.name: M:ImageResizer.InterceptModule.context_PreSendRequestHeaders(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: We don't actually send the data - but we still want to control the headers on the data. PreSendRequestHeaders allows us to change the content-type and cache headers at excatly the last

member.name: P:ImageResizer.InterceptModule.conf
member.summary: Current configuration. Same as Config.Current.Pipeline

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.SizeLimiting
member.summary: Implements app-wide size Limits on image size

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.SizeLimiting.Limits
member.summary: The image and total size limits

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DropShadow
member.summary: Adds drop shadow capabilities

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Caching.ResponseHeaders.ContentType
member.summary: The mime-type of the encoded image. Defaults to null

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Config.UpgradeImageBuilder(ImageResizer.ImageBuilder)

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Config.getNode(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a deep copy of the specified node

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Config.getConfigXml

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Configuration.Config.setConfigXml(ImageResizer.Configuration.Xml.Node)

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.Config.Current

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.Config.Plugins
member.summary: Access and modify plugins

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.Config.Pipeline
member.summary: Access and modify settings related to the HttpModule pipline. Register URL rewriting hooks, etc.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.Config.CurrentImageBuilder
member.summary: Returns a shared instance of ImageManager, (or a subclass if it has been upgraded). Instances change whenever ImageBuilderExtensions change.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.Config.cs
member.summary: The ResizeConfigrationSection is not thread safe, and should not be modified Dynamically loads the ResizerSection from web.config when accessed for the first time. If the resizer node doesn't exist, an empty configuration object is created with just the root resizer node.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Configuration.Config.AllIssues
member.summary: Returns a list of all issues reported by the resizing core, as well as by all the plugins

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.RoundPoints(System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Rounds the elements of the specified array [not used]

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.RoundPoints(System.Drawing.PointF[0:,0:])
member.summary: Rounds the elements of the specified array [not used]

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.ForEach(System.Array,ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.ForEachFunction)
member.summary: Modifies the specified array by applying the specified function to each element.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.RotatePoly(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Double)
member.summary: Rotates the specified polygon (or set of points) around the origin.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.RotatePoly(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Double,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Rotates the specified polygon (or set of points) around the origin.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.ToPoly(System.Drawing.RectangleF)
member.summary: Returns a clockwise array of points on the rectangle. Point 0 is top-left.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.NormalizePoly(System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Moves the polygon so that the upper-left corner of its bounding box is located at 0,0.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.RotateVector(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Double)
member.summary: Rotates the specified point around the origin.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.RotateVector(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Double,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Rotates the specified point around the specified origin.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.ChangeMagnitude(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Single)
member.summary: Returns a modified version of the specified vector with the desired length.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.GetBoundingBox(System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Returns a bounding box for the specified set of points.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.MovePoly(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Returns a modified version of the array, with each element being offset by the specified amount.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.ArraysEqual(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Returns true if the member elements of the specified arrays match, and the arrays are of the same length.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.getParallelogram(System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Moves element 4 to spot 3 and truncates to 3 elements. For compatiblity with Graphics.DrawImage

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.GetSubArray(System.Drawing.PointF[0:,0:],System.Int32)
member.summary: Grabs a single-dimension array from a 2 dimensional array, using the specified primary index.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.GenerateRadialBrush(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Single)
member.summary: Approximates a radial brush using a high-rez PathGradientBrush.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.ScaleInside(System.Drawing.SizeF,System.Drawing.SizeF)
member.summary: Scales 'inner' to fit inside 'bounding' while maintaining aspect ratio. Upscales and downscales.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.DownScaleInside(System.Drawing.SizeF,System.Drawing.SizeF)
member.summary: Scales 'inner' to fit inside 'bounding' while maintaining aspect ratio. Only downscales.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.FitsInside(System.Drawing.SizeF,System.Drawing.SizeF)
member.summary: Returns true if 'inner' fits inside or equals 'outer'

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.GetCorners(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Single)
member.summary:
Returns an array of parallelograms. These parallelgrams are the 'corners' outside each vertex in 'poly'. The adjacent edges are perpendicular to 'poly'. Point 1 of each parallelogram will match the respective point in 'poly' Points are clockwise.
TODO - some rounding issues going on, not exact numbers here

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.GetCorners(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Single[])
member.summary:
Returns an array of parallelograms. These parallelgrams are the 'corners' outside each vertex in 'poly'. The adjacent edges are perpendicular to 'poly'. Point 1 of each parallelogram will match the respective point in 'poly' Points are clockwise.
Each float in widths[] corresponds to the point in poly[]. This is the distance to go perpendicularly from the line beween poly[i] and poly[i +1].

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.GetSides(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Single)
member.summary: Returns an array of parallelograms. These parallelgrams are the 'sides' bounding the polygon. Points are clockwise. Point 1 is the top-left outer point, point 2 the top-right, point 3 the bottom-right, and point 4 the bottom-left.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.InflatePoly(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Single)
member.summary: Expands all sides on the specified polygon by the specified offset. Assumes the polygon is concave. Returns a new polygon

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.InflatePoly(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Single[])
member.summary: Expands all sides on the specified polygon by the specified offsets. Assumes the polygon is concave. Returns a new polygon.
member.param: An array the same size as poly[], with the distances to expand the edges. Edges are between i and i+1

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.CenterInside(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.PointF[])
member.summary: Moves 'inner' so that the center of its bounding box equals the center of the bounding box of 'outer'

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.PolygonMath.ToRectangle(System.Drawing.RectangleF)
member.summary: Rounds a floating-point rectangle to an integer rectangle using System.Round

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.SizeLimits.TotalSize
member.summary: The maximum final size an image generated by ImageBuilder can be. Defaults to 3200x3200

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.SizeLimits.TotalBehavior
member.summary: What action to take when the total size of the final image would exceed the TotalSize value. Defaults to ThowException

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.SizeLimits.ImageSize
member.summary: The maximum size an un-rotated image can be drawn when creating a resized image. Rotation will increase the total size, as will any borders, paddings, margins, or effects. Not effective at preventing attacks, use totalSize. If larger values are specified in a querystring, they will automatically be scaled to fit within these dimensions. Defaults to 1680x1680

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.IFileExtensionPlugin.GetSupportedFileExtensions
member.summary: If the plugin adds support for new file extensions (such as "psd"), they should be returned by this method.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Configuration.Issues.IssueSeverity.Critical
member.summary: Security and stability issues.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Configuration.Issues.IssueSeverity.Error
member.summary: Behavioral issues, such as having no registered image encoders

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Configuration.Issues.IssueSeverity.ConfigurationError
member.summary: Errors in the module configuration

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Configuration.Issues.IssueSeverity.Warning
member.summary: Non-optimal settings

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.Utils.fromQuerystringFriendly(System.String)
member.summary: Like fromQuerystring, but permits the leading '?' to be omitted.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.Utils.parseList(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Parses lists in the form "3,4,5,2,5" and "(3,4,40,50)". If a number cannot be parsed (i.e, number 2 in "5,,2,3") defaultValue is used.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.Utils.parseFlip(System.String)
member.summary: Returns RotateNoneFlipNone if not a recognize value.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.Utils.writeFlip(System.Drawing.RotateFlipType)
member.summary: Throws an exception if the specified value is unsupported. Rotation values are not supported, and should be specified with the Rotate command.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.Utils.parsePadding(System.String)
member.summary: Parses padding, allowing syntax (all) and (left, top, right, bottom). Parens are optional.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.Utils.DrawOuterGradient(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Draws a gradient around the specified polygon. Fades from 'inner' to 'outer' over a distance of 'width' pixels.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.UrlHasher.hash(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Builds a key for the cached version, using the hashcode of the normalized URL. if subfolders > 0, dirSeparator will be used to separate the subfolder and the key. No extension is appended. I.e, a13514\124211ab132592 or 12412ababc12141

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Util.UrlHasher.getSubfolder(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a string for the subfolder name. The bits used are from the end of the hash - this should make the hashes in each directory more unique, and speed up performance (8.3 filename calculations are slow when lots of files share the same first 6 chars. Returns null if not configured. Rounds subfolders up to the nearest power of two.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DiagnosticMode.None
member.summary: Diagnostics are disabled

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DiagnosticMode.Localhost
member.summary: Only local requests can access diagnostics

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.DiagnosticMode.AllHosts
member.summary: All hosts can view diagnostics.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.Basic.Diagnostic.AllowResponse(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: True if diagnostics can be displayed to the current user. If <diagnostics enableFor="None" />, returns false. If <diagnostics enableFor="Localhost" />, returns false for remote requests If <diagnostics enableFor="AllHosts" />, returns true. If unspecified, uses the same behavior as ASP.NET Custom Errors.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState
member.summary: Encapsulates the state of an image being resized. Can be used to simulate a resize as well as actually perform one. All code should ignore when Bitmaps and Graphics objects are null, and go about simulating all the mathematical functions as normal.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.settings
member.summary: The commands to apply to the bitmap

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.originalSize
member.summary: The original size of the source bitmap. Use this instead of accessing the bitmap directly for this information, since the bitmap may not always be available

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.supportsTransparency
member.summary: Rendering choices can depend on whether the output format supports transparency.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.layout
member.summary: The layout object. Used for calculated and flowing the layout of the various rings around the image (padding, border, effect, margin, etc).

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.destSize
member.summary: The size of the target bitmap image. Set after all sizing operations have completed.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.finalSize
member.summary: The dimensions of the bitmap afer all operations have been applied to it (Calling FlipRotate can change the bitmap dimensions).

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.copyRect
member.summary: The rectangular portion of the source image to copy

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.sourceBitmap
member.summary: The source bitmap. If null, skip drawing commands, but continue layout logic.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.destBitmap
member.summary: The destination bitmap. If null, skip drawing commands, but continue layout logic.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.destGraphics
member.summary: A graphics object to write to the destination bitmap. If null, skip drawing commands, but continue layout logic.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.copyAttibutes
member.summary: Allows color correction/modification during the image copy.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes sourceBitmap, destGraphics, destBitmap, and copyAttributes if they are non-null

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.copySize
member.summary: (read-only) Same as copyRect.Size, convenience property.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState.Data
member.summary: Allows extensions to store data along with the image state
